ctu.nengoros.modules

Interface NeuralModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AsynNeuralModule, java.lang.Cloneable, Node, PeripheralsRegisteringNode, Probeable, Resettable, java.io.Serializable, SimulationMode.ModeConfigurable, VisiblyMutable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MultiTerminationNeuralModule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsNeuralModule, DefaultNeuralModule, MultipleInputNeuralModule

    public interface NeuralModule
extends AsynNeuralModule
    The same as NeuralModule, but it adds support for synchronous communication.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface ca.nengo.util.VisiblyMutable

        VisiblyMutable.Event, VisiblyMutable.Listener, VisiblyMutable.NameChangeEvent, VisiblyMutable.NodeRemovedEvent

    • Method Detail

      • createDecoder

        void createDecoder(java.lang.String topicName,
                 java.lang.String dataType,
                 int[] dimensionSizes,
                 boolean synchronous)
        The same, but boolean synchronous tells whether to wait for incoming message after some message was sent by the neural module (most likely after each step). If the parameter is not specified, the default value of synchronous is used.
        Parameters:
        topicName -
        dataType -
        dimensionSizes -
        synchronous - - wait for incoming message after corresponding sent message?

        Turn synchronous communication on/off
        Parameters:
        synchronous -
